casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN. No. 115A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2004. William N. Farrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of December 2004 by Defendant to bypass the N.C. Court of Appeals on Indictment No. 99CRS3820:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2004."
